name: Introduction to Prompt Engineering
description: Master the fundamentals of prompt engineering to guide generative AI for accurate BI outputs.

data.about: Gain hands-on experience crafting effective prompts for BI tasks using AI tools.

reviews.review: The step-by-step exercises demystified prompt workflows for me.
reviews.author: Karen White

reviews.review: I built my first usable prompt-based report generator by the end of week one.
reviews.author: Tom Brooks

reviews.review: Loved how each module had clear objectives and hands-on tasks.
reviews.author: Sonia Patel

reviews.review: The quizzes reinforced my learning before moving on to the next section.
reviews.author: Ethan Murphy

name: Generative Narrative Techniques for BI
description: Learn to generate compelling narratives and summaries from BI data using generative AI models.

data.about: Transform raw BI data into engaging narratives and executive summaries.

reviews.review: The narrative techniques gave our executive summaries new clarity.
reviews.author: Linda Evans

reviews.review: Loved the live demos showing before/after narrative examples.
reviews.author: Marcus Li

reviews.review: The tips on structuring summaries were immediately applicable.
reviews.author: Priya Deshmukh

reviews.review: Each lesson built perfectly on the previous one, no confusion.
reviews.author: Omar Hassan

name: Automated Reporting with AI Pipelines
description: Build end-to-end AI pipelines to automate BI report generation and distribution.

data.about: Implement AI pipelines that fetch data, generate reports, and deliver them automatically.

reviews.review: Our team now spends zero time manually generating reports.
reviews.author: Natalie Ross

reviews.review: The module on error handling was especially helpful.
reviews.author: Daniel Kim

reviews.review: The course covers retries and logging best practices in depth.
reviews.author: Anya Petrova

reviews.review: Loved the walkthrough for connecting to our internal data warehouse.
reviews.author: Luis Mendoza

name: Real-time BI Dashboard Integration
description: Integrate generative AI into real-time dashboards to provide live insights and analytics.

data.about: Embed AI-generated insights into live dashboards for real-time decision making.

reviews.review: Our dashboards now update with AI insights every minute.
reviews.author: Olivia Parker

reviews.review: Examples with React and D3 made implementation straightforward.
reviews.author: Ethan Zhao

reviews.review: Latency was under 200ms even with heavy loads.
reviews.author: Maya Singh

reviews.review: The real-time filtering lab was exactly what I needed.
reviews.author: Carlos Alvarez

name: Advanced AI Models for Predictive BI
description: Dive into advanced generative and predictive models to forecast trends and anomalies in BI data.

data.about: Explore and apply advanced AI architectures to predictive BI use cases.

reviews.review: I deployed a time-series model that improved our sales predictions by 15%.
reviews.author: Priya Singh

reviews.review: The GAN-based lab let me generate synthetic data for edge cases.
reviews.author: Luis Fernández

reviews.review: Loved the section on hyperparameter tuning for forecasting models.
reviews.author: Zara Khan

reviews.review: The anomaly detection project was challenging but highly educational.
reviews.author: Henry O’Neill

name: Clustering and Segmentation Masterclass
description: Deep dive into clustering algorithms and segmentation strategies to uncover hidden patterns in data.

data.about: Learn to apply and evaluate clustering techniques on diverse datasets using Python and scikit-learn.
outcome: Assess cluster quality using silhouette scores
Apply segmentation to real-world business cases

reviews.review: Detailed lab on DBSCAN clarified clustering concepts.
reviews.author: Sophia Lee

reviews.review: Silhouette analysis lab helped me choose the right k.
reviews.author: David Chen

name: Advanced Classification Techniques
description: Master classification algorithms from decision trees to ensemble methods for predictive modeling.

data.about: Explore and implement advanced classification techniques on real datasets using scikit-learn.
outcome: Evaluate classifiers with precision, recall, and ROC

reviews.review: The ensemble methods section gave me confidence to use Random Forests at work.
reviews.author: Priya Sharma

reviews.review: Loved the exercises on tuning hyperparameters for XGBoost.
reviews.author: Miguel Torres

name: Association Rule Mining & Recommendation Systems
description: Learn to extract association rules and build recommendation engines from transactional data.

data.about: Discover frequent itemsets and generate rules to recommend products effectively.
outcome: Build a basic collaborative filtering system

reviews.review: The hands-on labs made Apriori and FP-Growth simple to understand.
reviews.author: Laura Nguyen

reviews.review: I applied these techniques to our sales data and improved upsell recommendations.
reviews.author: Ravi Patel

name: Text Mining and Web Scraping for Data Mining
description: Gather and analyze textual and web data to extract insights and build predictive models.

data.about: Learn to scrape web data and perform text mining techniques to uncover actionable insights.

reviews.review: The web scraping labs gave me everything I needed to collect data at scale.
reviews.author: Elena Morales

reviews.review: Topic modeling section helped me segment articles by theme.
reviews.author: Omar Rahman

name: Supervised Learning Essentials
description: Learn core supervised algorithms—regression, classification, and evaluation metrics—through hands-on Python projects.

data.about: Build, train, and evaluate supervised models on real datasets using scikit-learn and Python.
outcome: Interpret model coefficients and feature importances

reviews.review: The regression labs gave me a solid understanding of model fitting.
reviews.author: Oliver Bennett

reviews.review: I deployed a classification API by following the project walkthrough.
reviews.author: Aisha Khan

name: Unsupervised Learning in Practice
description: Master clustering, dimensionality reduction, and anomaly detection techniques with real-world datasets.

data.about: Discover hidden structures in data and reduce dimensionality for visualization and modeling.
outcome: Apply clustering algorithms to segment data
Perform PCA and t-SNE for feature reduction

reviews.review: The PCA module helped me visualize customer segments effectively.
reviews.author: Marcus Liu

reviews.review: The anomaly detection project was directly applicable to my security use case.
reviews.author: Nina Patel

name: Reinforcement Learning Fundamentals
description: Introduction to reinforcement learning concepts and algorithms, including Q-learning and policy gradients.

data.about: Learn to train agents to make sequential decisions using reinforcement learning environments.

reviews.review: The Q-learning lab made complex concepts approachable.
reviews.author: Sophia Grant

reviews.review: Training agents in OpenAI Gym was my favorite part.
reviews.author: Liam O’Sullivan

name: Convolutional Neural Networks in Practice
description: Hands-on training in building, training, and optimizing CNNs for image classification and feature extraction.

data.about: Build, train, and deploy CNNs using PyTorch and TensorFlow to solve real-world vision tasks.

course_creator.university: IIT Bombay Department of Computer Science

reviews.review: The practical labs on transfer learning were invaluable.
reviews.author: Rhea Sharma

reviews.review: I implemented a classifier for medical images by the end of week two.
reviews.author: Arjun Mehta

reviews.review: Pooling and stride concepts were explained perfectly.
reviews.author: Nina Desai

name: Sequence Modeling with RNNs and LSTMs
description: Learn to model sequential data using RNNs, LSTMs, and GRUs for tasks like language modeling and time-series forecasting.

data.about: Implement and train RNNs and LSTMs from scratch, and apply them to NLP and forecasting tasks.

course_creator.university: IIT Bombay Department of Computer Science

reviews.review: The LSTM implementation lab clarified many doubts.
reviews.author: Vikram Singh

reviews.review: I used RNNs to forecast sales data successfully.
reviews.author: Priya Nair

reviews.review: GRU comparison lab was highly informative.
reviews.author: Sai Kumar

name: Transformer Architectures and Attention Mechanisms
description: Explore the transformer model and self-attention, and learn to build and fine-tune transformer-based networks.

data.about: Dive into the transformer architecture, understand attention mechanisms, and fine-tune pre-trained transformer models.

course_creator.university: IIT Bombay Department of Computer Science

reviews.review: Attention lab was enlightening—I can now build custom transformer blocks.
reviews.author: Anisha Patel

reviews.review: Fine-tuning BERT on custom data was seamless after this course.
reviews.author: David Liu

reviews.review: The multi-head attention visualization tool was excellent.
reviews.author: Fatima Khan

name: Variational Autoencoders and Generative Models
description: Learn to build and train VAEs and other generative models for data synthesis and anomaly detection.

data.about: Implement VAEs from scratch, visualize latent spaces, and apply generative models to create new data samples.

course_creator.university: IIT Bombay Department of Computer Science

reviews.review: Building a VAE from scratch clarified the theory immensely.
reviews.author: Rohan Deshmukh

reviews.review: I used VAEs for anomaly detection in network logs successfully.
reviews.author: Sneha Rao

reviews.review: The manifold visualizer lab was a highlight.
reviews.author: Leila Ahmed

name: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) Mastery
description: Master GAN architectures, training stability techniques, and apply GANs to image synthesis and transformation.

data.about: Implement GANs from the ground up, explore advanced variants, and apply them to creative and analytical use cases.

course_creator.university: IIT Bombay Department of Computer Science

reviews.review: The stabilization tricks lab saved me hours of debugging.
reviews.author: Meera Singh

reviews.review: I generated high-quality images from noise within days.
reviews.author: Arun Roy

reviews.review: The image-to-image translation module was fantastic.
reviews.author: Leah Kim

name: Word Embeddings and Representations
description: Learn to create and utilize word and sentence embeddings for downstream NLP tasks.

data.about: Cover training and using static and contextual embeddings to represent text in vector form.
outcome: Train custom Word2Vec and GloVe models

reviews.review: The hands-on labs made vector representations intuitive.
reviews.author: Emily Carter

reviews.review: Implementing FastText improved our rare‐word handling instantly.
reviews.author: Ravi Kumar

name: Sequence-to-Sequence Models and Attention
description: Master encoder-decoder architectures and attention mechanisms for translation and summarization.

data.about: Build and train seq2seq models with attention to perform machine translation and text summarization.

reviews.review: Visualizing attention weights was a game-changer.
reviews.author: Laura Chen

reviews.review: I built an English-French translator by following the exercises.
reviews.author: Marco Silva

name: Transformer Models and BERT Fine-Tuning
description: Dive into the transformer architecture and fine-tune BERT for classification and QA tasks.

data.about: Understand transformer internals and apply Hugging Face tools to fine-tune pre-trained models.

reviews.review: Fine-tuning BERT on our legal texts was straightforward.
reviews.author: Priya Deshpande

reviews.review: The REST API deployment example saved me days of work.
reviews.author: Liam O’Brien

name: Building Chatbots and Dialogue Systems
description: Learn to design, implement, and evaluate chatbots using retrieval-based and generative approaches.

data.about: Create conversational agents with rule-based flows and neural dialogue models.

reviews.review: The Rasa module was especially clear and actionable.
reviews.author: Aisha Khan

reviews.review: Building a seq2seq bot was the highlight for me.
reviews.author: Jamal Edwards

name: Deploying NLP Models to Production
description: Operationalize NLP workflows: containerization, monitoring, and scalable serving of language models.

data.about: Learn best practices to containerize, serve, and monitor NLP models in a production environment.

reviews.review: The Docker + Kubernetes walk-through was spot-on.
reviews.author: Michael Tan

reviews.review: Setting up Prometheus alerts for model drift was very helpful.
reviews.author: Zara Ahmed

name: Fundamentals of Image Processing
description: Learn the core techniques of image processing, including filtering, transformations, and feature extraction.

data.about: Understand how to manipulate and enhance images programmatically using OpenCV and PIL.
outcome: Apply spatial and frequency domain filters

reviews.review: The filtering labs helped me clean noisy images in my project.

reviews.review: Edge detection exercises were explained perfectly.
reviews.author: Mariana Silva

name: Object Detection with YOLO and Faster R-CNN
description: Implement and compare state-of-the-art object detectors for real-time and high-accuracy use cases.

data.about: Train and deploy YOLO and Faster R-CNN models on custom datasets using PyTorch.

reviews.review: I deployed a YOLOv5 detector to our surveillance system seamlessly.

reviews.review: Faster R-CNN lab improved my precision by 12%.

name: Semantic and Instance Segmentation
description: Master segmentation techniques to delineate objects at pixel-level for advanced vision tasks.

data.about: Implement U-Net and Mask R-CNN for semantic and instance segmentation with real datasets.
outcome: Apply Mask R-CNN for instance tasks

reviews.review: My segmentation accuracy jumped from 65% to 89%.

reviews.review: CRF post-processing module was a game-changer.
reviews.author: Omar Aziz

name: 3D Computer Vision and Depth Estimation
description: Explore techniques for reconstructing and understanding 3D scenes from 2D images.

data.about: Implement depth estimation models and 3D reconstruction pipelines using multi-view imagery.

reviews.review: SfM pipeline implementation was thorough and well-explained.
reviews.author: Lara Kim

reviews.review: Monocular depth estimation module exceeded expectations.
reviews.author: Rohit Gupta

name: Vision Transformers and Attention in CV
description: Apply transformer architectures and attention mechanisms to computer vision tasks.

data.about: Understand and implement vision transformer models, and fine-tune them on custom image datasets.

reviews.review: ViT implementation was clear and concise.
reviews.author: Nina Farooq

reviews.review: Attention visualization tools were incredibly insightful.
reviews.author: David Park

name: Advanced Spark Analytics
description: Deep dive into Spark SQL, DataFrame APIs, and Structured Streaming to process and analyze large-scale data.

data.about: Learn to build, tune, and deploy high-performance Spark applications for batch and streaming workloads.

reviews.review: The performance tuning section cut our job runtimes by 50%.

reviews.review: Structured Streaming examples helped me launch real-time alerts quickly.
reviews.author: Sophia Lee

reviews.review: Deploying Spark on k8s was straightforward after following the labs.
reviews.author: Miguel Torres

name: Building Real-Time Streaming Pipelines with Kafka
description: Architect, implement, and monitor real-time data pipelines using Apache Kafka and related ecosystem tools.

data.about: Design end-to-end streaming architectures, implement Kafka-based pipelines, and ensure reliability in production.

reviews.review: Kafka Streams labs helped me build a fault-tolerant analytics pipeline.
reviews.author: Liam O’Connor

reviews.review: Understanding schema evolution saved us from breaking changes in production.
reviews.author: Priya Desai

reviews.review: The Prometheus & Grafana section was exactly what I needed to track lag and throughput.
reviews.author: Anya Petrova

name: Dash App Development for Interactive Data Visualization
description: Learn to build and deploy interactive dashboards using Plotly Dash to communicate insights effectively.

data.about: Step through designing and coding full-featured Dash applications, then deploy them to share with stakeholders.

reviews.review: Building my first Dash app was surprisingly straightforward.

reviews.review: The Heroku deployment walkthrough saved me hours of debugging.

name: Advanced Plotly & Seaborn Techniques
description: Master complex chart types and customization using Plotly and Seaborn for publication-quality visualizations.

data.about: Dive into advanced plotting features, theming, and interactivity to elevate your data storytelling.

reviews.review: The animation module took my dashboards to the next level.

reviews.review: Seaborn theming tips helped me match corporate branding perfectly.

name: Docker & Containerization for ML
description: Learn to containerize machine learning models and pipelines for consistent, reproducible deployments.

data.about: Step through packaging your models and inference code into Docker containers ready for production.

reviews.review: I containerized my first model with zero issues.

reviews.review: Multi-stage builds really cut down my image sizes.

name: Kubernetes Deployment of Machine Learning Models
description: Discover how to deploy and manage ML workloads on Kubernetes clusters using best practices.

data.about: Set up Kubernetes environments, helm charts, and CI/CD pipelines to serve and scale ML models.

reviews.review: Helm chart module helped me standardize our deployments.

reviews.review: Autoscaling labs ensured our service stayed responsive under load.

name: Bias Detection & Mitigation Strategies
description: Identify and mitigate bias in AI systems using quantitative and qualitative techniques.

data.about: Learn frameworks and tools to audit datasets and models for bias, then apply mitigation strategies.

reviews.review: I spotted biases in our hiring model I never knew existed.
reviews.author: Jae-Min Park

reviews.review: The hands-on mitigation labs were immediately useful.

name: Privacy & Security in AI Systems
description: Explore techniques for ensuring data privacy and security in AI applications, from differential privacy to secure enclaves.

data.about: Understand and implement privacy-preserving methods and secure deployment practices for AI systems.

reviews.review: Differential privacy module was exactly what our legal team needed.

reviews.review: Secure multi-party computation labs were thorough and well-supported.
reviews.author: Michael Tan
